Introduction

Yubin is a South Korean singer, dancer and actress under AB Creative, member of the girl group ARTBEAT and the co-ed dance crew ARTBEAT. She joined the agency AB Creative in 2019 or earlier where she was active as a dancer in their dance group 'AB' (also called AB Project) and also as a soloist dance performer.
